prompt.preamble:
We are testing a system for understanding people's interest in reading different kinds of online articles.
For example, you might be interested in articles about some topics, but not about others.
prompt.task_description: your preferences of what kinds of online articles you would like to read
prompt.final: In the final part of the study, you will give feedback on a test set of article headline and descriptions, which will enable us to see how well a chatbot reading your responses has learned what you like and dislike.
prompt.evaluation: Please indicate whether you would like to read the following articles: "yes" if you would, "no" if you would not.

conversation_history.message:
Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: HealthAndFitness365
Title: Yoga as a Means to Mental Well-being: A Detailed Insight 
Description: Deep dive into the world of Yoga and explore its profound impact on mental health. Learn from experts about various Yoga postures and their psychological benefits, along with a daily Yoga routine for an enriching life.
Yes I want to improve my mental well-being.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: ArtisticJourneys
Title: The Evolution of Surrealism and Dadaism in 21st Century Art 
Description: Explore the ever-changing landscape of surrealism and dadaism through the lens of modern creatives. This article provides an in-depth analysis of how these art movements have shaped, and continue to influence, the world of contemporary art.
Not at this time. I am not a big fan of art but do enjoy learning about history.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: GlobalEconomics101
Title: The Role of Cryptocurrency in Emerging Economies: A Case Study of Bitcoin in Venezuela 
Description: This article investigates the impact of Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies on the economic landscape of developing countries. With a special focus on Venezuela, it presents an analysis of how digital currencies are shaping financial transactions and offering a lifeline in countries with hyperinflation.
yes it's important to know how cryptocurrencies are impacting all economies.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: FutureSustainability
Title: The Intersection of Technology and Ecology: A Deep Dive into Bioengineered Solutions for Climate Change
Description: This piece provides a detailed overview of the emerging field of bioengineering and its potential to address pressing environmental issues like climate change. From algae-based biofuels to CRISPR-edited crops for increased food security, find out how technology is changing the face of conservation and sustainability.
Yes. I would want to learn more about how our species can help the environment.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: QuantumPhysicsToday
Title: Understanding Quantum Entanglement: Einstein's Spooky Action at a Distance 
Description: Delve into the fascinating world of quantum physics and unravel the mystery behind Einstein's 'spooky action at a distance'. This article offers a layman's guide to understanding quantum entanglement and its implications for faster-than-light communication and quantum computing.
Absolutely. I have always wanted to know more about Quantum entanglement and this article sounds like it would be easy to understand.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: EpicureanDelights
Title: The Gastronomic Revolution: Molecular Gastronomy and Its Impact on Traditional Cuisine 
Description: Dive into the world of molecular gastronomy and discover how it is revolutionizing traditional cooking methods. This article explores the scientific principles behind some of your favorite dishes, and how chefs around the world are using chemistry to take their creations to a whole new level.
no it does not interest me.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: SpaceChronicles
Title: Mars Colonization - A Reality or Science Fiction: An In-Depth Exploration of Current Technologies and Future Possibilities
Description: Take a journey into the realm of space exploration and dive deep into the current efforts towards Mars colonization. This article breaks down the scientific, technological, and social challenges we face, while also shedding light on the potential opportunities that come with becoming an interplanetary species.

Description: About 80 percent of new cars sold in Norway are battery-powered. As a result, the air is cleaner, the streets are quieter and the grid hasn’t collapsed. But problems with unreliable chargers persist.
evaluation_results.label: yes
evaluation_results.explanation: I am interested about how electric vehicles will impact society in the future

query_prompt.content:
Your task is to learn what topics a user is interested in reading online article about. People's interests are broad, so you should seek to understand their interests across many topics; in other words, go for breadth rather than depth. Do not assume a user has given a complete answer to any question, so make sure to keep probing different types of interests.

Come up with a potential edge case to learn as much information as you can about what their desired behavior should be under different circumstances.
Make sure the edge case addresses different aspects of the system than the edge cases that have already been considered.

An example edge case is: Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: TechTalkDaily
Title: 10 Must-Have Gadgets for 2023: A Comprehensive Guide
Description: Discover the top 10 gadgets that will revolutionize your daily life in 2023. From smart home devices to the latest wearables, we've got you covered with our comprehensive guide.

Current cases:
- [Q] -> [A]

Generate the most informative edge case that, when answered, will reveal the most about the desired behavior beyond what has already been queried for above. Generate the edge case in the following format, and nothing else: "Are you interested in the following article? [edge case]"
